last_episode_to_air.name: Tillie Talks
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tillie keeps interrupting Snugs on their playdate.

name: Esme & Roy
overview: Monster-sitters Esme and Roy use the power of play to help younger monsters through familiar situations, including trying new foods and feeling scared during loud thunderstorms. Little viewers will discover positive role models, and learn how to manage their emotions with simple mindfulness practices.

episodes.name: Monster Trucks
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are having a blast watching Tillie, a car-loving Plink Monster. When bath time rolls around, Tillie refuses to hop in the tub! Thankfully, Esme and Roy know that with a little imagination and a few pool noodles, they can make bath time the best time!

episodes.name: Lunch Crunch
episodes.overview: It’s lunchtime at Simon’s house, and Simon can’t wait for Esme and Roy to fix the only meal he eats: a fish and stinky cheese sandwich. When the family pet gobbles up the last of the fish and stinky cheese, Esme and Roy use their love of art to get Simon to branch out.

episodes.name: Dark and Stormy Knight
episodes.overview: A thunderstorm is coming, and Esme and Roy are watching the huggable Snugs. He’s absolutely terrified of storms, and when Muzzywump monsters get scared, they puff up. Soon, Snugs is the size of a house! Esme and Roy use their quick thinking to calm Snugs back to his regular size.

episodes.name: Two Can Play at That Game
episodes.overview: Bleederblop Monsters Frank and Franny are eager to play, but each one wants to play a different game: Frank wants to play ballet, while Franny wants to play pirates. Esme and Roy try to juggle both games at once, but it proves to be more exhausting than they imagined. With a little teamwork and imagination, Esme and Roy have just the solution!

episodes.name: Noisy Naptime
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters are watching the musically-inclined Ooga monster, Hugo, while his baby sister Fig gets her nap. But Hugo has a hard time staying quiet! Esme and Roy find a low-key game for Hugo so his baby sister can get her beauty sleep.

episodes.name: The Hugo Express
episodes.overview: When Esme and Roy get to Hugo’s house, his father tells them that they need to keep the house extra clean. But when the three get wrapped up playing trains, they make a huge mess! Can the Monster Sitters find a fun way to clean up before Daddy Ooga gets home?

episodes.name: Gentle, Gentle
episodes.overview: She’s strong! She’s mighty! She’s…teeny tiny? Esme and Roy are watching littlest Ooga monster, Fig, who is very strong for her small size.  When Fig comes across Roy’s monster pet, Dumpling, she wants to squeeze Dumpling too tight! Esme and Roy use their quick thinking – and a guinea pig costume! – to show Fig the strength in being gentle.

episodes.name: The Case of the Missing Cuddles
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are watching Snugs one evening. Just before bedtime, they realize Snugs’ favorite stuffed toy is missing – and Snugs can’t sleep without it! With a little ingenuity and some Sherlock Holmes flair, Esme and Roy search for the missing toy.

episodes.name: Supermarket Match
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are watching Tillie at the supermarket when Tillie starts grabbing anything and everything in the store! Esme and Roy use their knowledge of matching – and some awesome teamwork – to create a game that’ll focus Tillie’s energy and make grocery shopping the best part of the day.

episodes.name: Imitation Frustration
episodes.overview: It’s a beautiful day, so Esme and Roy take Hoozlewoo siblings Sid and Lucy to play in the park. But when Sid starts copying everything Lucy does, Lucy gets frustrated—she wants to do her own thing! Esme and Roy flip the script with a playground game that helps everyone have a great time!

episodes.name: Hugo, We Have a Problem
episodes.overview: When Esme and Roy get to Hugo’s house, his father tells them that they need to keep the house extra clean. But when the three get wrapped up playing trains, they make a huge mess! Can the Monster Sitters find a fun way to clean up before Daddy Ooga gets home?

episodes.name: A New Chapter
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are watching Simon, who can’t wait to read the next book in his favorite series.  But Grammy Swoozle accidentally takes the book with her when she leaves! Esme and Roy use their imaginations and love of stories to find a solution where everyone lives happily ever after.

episodes.name: Game Plan
episodes.overview: It’s time for Monster Scout Camp, and Esme and Roy are helping Tillie get ready for her first day. But Tillie keeps getting distracted – she wants to keep playing! Thankfully, the Monster Sitters know just the game to get Tillie focused while still having fun …but will Tillie make it out the door before the bus arrives?

episodes.name: A Way to Play
episodes.overview: Simon and Tillie are coming by Monster Sitters’ HQ for a playdate, but the neat-and-tidy Simon and the rambunctious and messy Tillie have trouble finding a game they can both enjoy. Thankfully, Esme and Roy find a fun (and colorful!) solution to help them find the perfect balance of messy and neat.

episodes.name: Sing Out, Roy!
episodes.overview: It’s time for the Monsterdale Talent Show! When Roy’s stage fright causes him to freeze up, Esme uses her creative thinking, teamwork, and a dash of crafty flair to get Roy ready for his big debut.

episodes.name: Monster’s Little Helper
episodes.overview: Roy and Esme meet the quirky and enthusiastic Lottie, who wants nothing more than to be a monster sitter herself! But when Lottie accidentally shrinks baby Fig while they’re out on a “mission,” Esme and Roy need to use their powers of observation and love of games to help Lottie find Fig and get her back to her regular size.

episodes.name: Simon's Sleepover
episodes.overview: Simon is coming over to the Monster Sitters' HQ for a sleepover! When he starts to miss home, Esme and Roy must get creative and combine their craftiness with a dash of kindness to help him feel right at home so that he can have the best sleepover ever!

episodes.name: Take a Hike
episodes.overview: Roy and Esme are going for a nature walk in the woods with Snugs. When they can't remember the way back, Snugs gets nervous. Thankfully, Esme and Roy know that with a little close observation and a good game, there's always a solution to help them see the forest for the trees.

episodes.name: Birds of a Feather
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are taking a gaggle of little monsters to the museum, but they all want to see different exhibits! How can Esme and Roy help them stay together while still having a blast?

episodes.name: Cowgirl Fig
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are watching Hugo and Fig, and Hugo is making a Western movie! Hugo is the director, Fig is the star and Esme and Roy are also actors. But baby Fig won't follow directions and Hugo can't make his movie without her! Now, the Monster Sitters need to get Hugo's movie back on track.

episodes.name: When Figs Fly
episodes.overview: Hugo and Fig head to Monster Sitters' HQ for a day of superhero fun. But while they're playing, Fig decides she wants to fly like Hugo. Esme and Roy try to help Fig feel like she's flying, but she doesn't want to play pretend--she wants to fly for real. Now, Esme and Roy need to show Fig she can save the day in her own special way.

episodes.name: Tillie's Tough Break
episodes.overview: Tillie hurt her leg and can't go on a trip to Monster Mountain, the most exciting amusement park in Monsterdale. She's so sad! The Monster Sitters try cheering up Tillie with silly songs and dances, but nothing seems to be working. It's up to Esme and Roy to make sure Tillie's day is just as exciting as Monster Mountain.

episodes.name: Cloudy Comet Calamity
episodes.overview: Simon is visiting Monster Sitters' HQ and brings his telescope so that he can see the Great Swoozle Comet fly across the sky when the time is right. But when he heads outside, he discovers large clouds blocking his view. The Monster Sitters look for a new vantage point and even try moving the clouds, but don’t have any luck. Will Simon ever get to see the Great Swoozle Comet?

episodes.name: Training Day
episodes.overview: Today is Monster Sitter Training Day! Instead of watching little monsters, Esme and Roy are brushing up on their Monster-Sitting skills. But the challenges turn out to be harder than they expected, and they can’t seem to pass any of them. Have Esme and Roy lost their touch?

episodes.name: Monster Mash
episodes.overview: Hugo, Tillie and Simon go to Monster Sitters' HQ for a dance party. Every time Simon tries to dance like his friends, though, his arms start to wiggle and get in the way. But when Esme and Roy teach Simon a dance pattern to follow, he's able to boogie down!

episodes.name: Block Party
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are watching Tillie. Mr. Plink tells them that Tillie needs to clean up her blocks in the backyard before she can play with her new truck, but she keeps getting distracted. Cleaning up blocks isn’t fun, and Tillie really wants to play with her new bulldozer. Can the Monster Sitters convince Tillie to clean up so that they can all play together?

episodes.name: Achoo, Matey
episodes.overview: Snugs has a bad case of the Sneezles and needs to rest in bed, but he has a hard time staying put.

episodes.name: Beach Bummer
episodes.overview: It's Simon’s first time at the beach and Esme and Roy want to show him a great time, but everything keeps going wrong.

episodes.name: The Greatest Show in Monsterdale
episodes.overview: When Hugo and Fig don’t want to share their Monster Sitters, Esme and Roy need to get creative and teach them how to take turns.

episodes.name: The Amazing Outdoors
episodes.overview: Simon has watched enough of his favorite TV show, so Esme and Roy take him outside. But will they be able to find anything more amazing than his show?

episodes.name: Icky Pop
episodes.overview: Tillie is having a no-good, rotten day— she’s got a case of the Ickies! Now, it’s up to Esme and Roy to find the cure.

episodes.name: Dream Submarine
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy are tucking Tillie in for bed, but when they turn out the lights, Tillie starts to see things in the dark.

episodes.name: Special Delivery
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters take Fig to a birthday party, but she won't let go of the present. Now, it's up to them to teach Fig the joys of giving.

episodes.name: Fig Do It
episodes.overview: When Baby Fig wants to do everything herself, Esme and Roy need to teach her that it's okay to ask for help.

episodes.name: Top Dog
episodes.overview: Simon wants to teach his dog, Willie, a new trick for the Monsterdale Dog Show.

episodes.name: Picture Day Predicament
episodes.overview: It's Picture Day and the Monster Sitters are walking Tillie to school, but keeping her clean along the way proves difficult.

episodes.name: Grandmonster's Day
episodes.overview: Simon wants to find the perfect present for his Grammy on Grandmonster's Day.

episodes.name: Monster Bash
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters are taking Hugo and Fig to the Monster Bash, but Fig can't decide on a costume.

episodes.name: Air Snugs
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters agree to help Mrs. Muzzywump with her errands, but Snugs becomes fixated on an airplane ride.

episodes.name: A Mighty Shy Guy
episodes.overview: Simon wants to play with new monsters at the park, but feels too shy to introduce himself.

episodes.name: Ooga, Party of Six
episodes.overview: Hugo and Fig want to cook dinner for their parents, but the kitchen jobs are too dangerous. Can Esme and Roy find a way for them to help?

episodes.name: How Hugo Got His Toots Back
episodes.overview: Hugo is practicing for the Noisy Parade, and practices so much that he loses his ability to toot. How can Esme and Roy help Hugo get his toots back?

episodes.name: Tilliesaurus
episodes.overview: When Tillie wants to play with real dinosaurs, Esme and Roy need to think of the next best thing.

episodes.name: Toy Share or Not Toy Share
episodes.overview: Simon goes to Tillie's house for a playdate, but she has a hard time sharing her toys. Now, it's up to Esme and Roy to help them take turns.

episodes.name: Officer Tillie
episodes.overview: Tillie loves playing with her new police car, but she's zooming around so fast that it's hard for her friends to play with her.

episodes.name: Fuzzy Ball
episodes.overview: Snugs wants to learn a new game, but when it starts to get difficult, he gives up. Can Esme and Roy convince him to stick with it?

episodes.name: A Rocky Business
episodes.overview: Hugo is busy running a crafts store when Fig starts a competing business. Can the Monster Sitters get the little monsters to work together?

episodes.name: Bedtime for Hugo
episodes.overview: At bedtime, Hugo wants to keep playing with his Monster Sitters. Can Esme and Roy make going to bed fun, too?

episodes.name: Stroller Derby
episodes.overview: When Hugo forgets his lunchbox, Esme and Roy decide to take it to him at school - but Fig won't get in her stroller.

episodes.name: The Inside Job
episodes.overview: Snugs is having lots of fun at the park when it starts to get really chilly. Can the Monster Sitters convince Snugs to come inside and warm up?

episodes.name: Party Time
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy find out that five little monsters are coming over, so they decide to throw a party. But things don't go according to plan.

episodes.name: The Really Really Big Race
episodes.overview: Simon comes to Tillie's house for a big race, but soon discovers that he doesn't like racing. Esme and Roy need to find a way for them to play.

episodes.name: A Dino-Mite Lunch
episodes.overview: It's lunchtime, but hungry Tillie's too busy playing dino-racecars to eat! How will Esme and Roy convince her to take a break to refuel?

episodes.name: Baby Hugo
episodes.overview: When big kid Hugo decides he'd rather be a baby again, the Monster Sitters host a game-show to prove that being a big kid is loads of fun, too.

episodes.name: To Cupcake with Love
episodes.overview: Snugs doesn't want to wait for "later," he wants to eat his cupcakes now! Can Esme and Roy help the cute little monster learn patience?

episodes.name: A True Monsterpiece
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters show aspiring artist Simon that each of his imperfect paintings is special.

episodes.name: The Book Bind
episodes.overview: When Tillie's favorite book is checked out, Esme and Roy help her discover all the other wonderful books in the library.

episodes.name: Don't Bug Me
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters show Sid that bugs can be cool!

episodes.name: The Swoozie News
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy help Simon make his own newspaper in order to keep him from interrupting Grammy.

episodes.name: Throw and Tell
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters find a way to keep baby Fig from throwing things around the house.

episodes.name: The Very Sleepy Tillie
episodes.overview: It's time for Tillie to take a nap -- but she wants to play with Esme and Roy instead. How will the Monster Sitters get a sleepy Tillie to rest so she can be her best?

episodes.name: Personal Space
episodes.overview: When baby Fig is left out of Hugo and Frank's space explorer game, Esme and Roy encourage the big kids to include her!

episodes.name: Snugs to the Rescue
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters help teach Snugs to be brave after he gets a boo-boo in the park.

episodes.name: Lickety Split
episodes.overview: When Tillie and Snugs decide to play two different games, Esme and Roy show them how to have fun together.

episodes.name: Not Kitten Around
episodes.overview: When Tillie and Snugs want to play with the same kitty toy, the Monster Sitters deal with a double Monster Meltdown! Will these little ones learn to take turns?

episodes.name: The Show Must Go On
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy help "Inspector Hugo" solve a mystery for his play.

episodes.name: It's in the Bag
episodes.overview: Hugo wants to pack everything in his room for his sleepover at Simon's house. Can the Monster Sitters help him figure out what he really needs to bring?

episodes.name: Are We There Yet?
episodes.overview: When their walk to the museum leaves Simon impatient, Esme and Roy find ways to pass the time.

episodes.name: The Princess Of Play Parts 1 And 2
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy gather their favorite little monsters for the annual story-time picnic! This tale follows a princess trying to save her kingdom from a grumpy monster named Grumbles who wants to make all the toys disappear.

episodes.name: Big Brother Snugs
episodes.overview: The Monster Sitters show a nervous Snugs how to be the best big brother ever to his new baby brother, Fuzzy.

episodes.name: Sound Reasoning
episodes.overview: After watching a spooky show, Esme and Roy help a scared Simon investigate all the creepy noises in the house.

episodes.name: Think Big
episodes.overview: A monster meltdown’s on deck when Snugs learns that his favorite big-kid games aren’t safe for baby Fuzzy. Will Esme and Roy find a way for the Monster siblings to play together?

episodes.name: Warm And Fuzzy Day
episodes.overview: Sid and Lucy arrives at the Monster Sitters’ HQ to make cards for a Warm and Fuzzy Day party, but can they finish them in time?

episodes.name: Snuggle Bunny
episodes.overview: After Fig’s favorite stuffed toy Bunny gets dirty at snack time, will Esme and Roy be able to keep her occupied while Bunny gets washed?

episodes.name: Blown Away
episodes.overview: When the weather threatens to ruin Tillie’s beach day, the Monster Sitters show her all the ways wind can help her play.

episodes.name: An Open Book
episodes.overview: Will the Monster Sitters find an activity for Baby Fig that won’t disturb Hugo while he reads his favorite book?

episodes.name: So Long Stuff
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy help Snugs say “Goodbye” to the things he’s outgrown so that he can hand them to his baby brother Fuzzy.

episodes.name: Holiday Spirit
episodes.overview: Simon and Snugs learn the true meaning of the holidays.

episodes.name: Snow Worries
episodes.overview: Fig and the Monstersitters use their imaginations to create the best snow day ever!

episodes.name: The Tooting Twosome
episodes.overview: Hugo and Fig are practicing for their Monsterdale Festival duet when Fig gets a case of the monster hiccups!

episodes.name: Cheer up, Pup!
episodes.overview: Can Simon and the Monstersitters find a way to cheer up Willie after his best doggie friend moves away?

episodes.name: Can't Touch This
episodes.overview: Fig wants to touch everything. Now it's up to Esme and Roy to find something for her to play with.

episodes.name: Mission Bedtime
episodes.overview: Will the Monstersitters be able to help Simon stop playing his new game and get ready for bed?

episodes.name: Flying High
episodes.overview: Can the Monstersitters find a game that Snugs, Frank, and Franny can all play together?

episodes.name: Hugo the Entertainer
episodes.overview: Hugo tries to find a show that entertains everyone.

episodes.name: Dream Team
episodes.overview: When Hugo and Tillie start turning everything into a competition, Esme and Roy try to find a way for them to play together.

episodes.name: It's A Jungle Out There
episodes.overview: The Monstersitters help Simon discover a fun way to exercise.

episodes.name: Swoozlepox
episodes.overview: When Simon comes down with a case of Swoozlepox, Esme and Roy try to help him stop scratching.

episodes.name: Balloon Blues
episodes.overview: The Monstersitters help Snugs overcome his fear of heights so he can ride the hot air balloon ride at the fair.

episodes.name: Tillie Unplugged
episodes.overview: When the power goes out, Esme and Roy help Tillie have fun without electricity.

episodes.name: Starring Simon
episodes.overview: The Monstersitters help Hugo and Simon make a movie together.

episodes.name: Doctor Drama
episodes.overview: The Monstersitters help Tillie get ready for her doctor's appointment.

episodes.name: Dumplings Birthday
episodes.overview: It's Dumpling's birthday and Simon and Hugo are helping set up! Can the Monstersitters get them to compromise on party decorations?

episodes.name: Sofishticated Taste
episodes.overview: Snugs has to eat a healthy dinner before he can have his favorite dessert.

episodes.name: Knight Rider
episodes.overview: Esme and Roy help Tillie regain her courage after she falls off her bike.

episodes.name: Unicorn Tillie
episodes.overview: Tillie has a big soccer game, but she doesn't want to change out of her unicorn costume!

episodes.name: Boxed In
episodes.overview: When the MonsterCase breaks down, Snugs looks through a box of old toys to find something to play with.

episodes.name: Monsterpet Badge
episodes.overview: Simon is trying to earn his Pet Badge, but Willie won't stop playing.

episodes.name: The Long Goodnight
episodes.overview: When Simon and Snugs have a sleepover, they discover that they have very different bedtime routines.

episodes.name: Best Day Ever
episodes.overview: Hugo is having the best beach day ever and doesn't want the fun to end!

episodes.name: The Waiting Game
episodes.overview: Fig has a hard time waiting her turn at the playground.

episodes.name: Fansgiving
episodes.overview: Simon learns the true meaning of Fangsgiving after things don't go according to plan.

episodes.name: Tillie Talks
episodes.overview: Tillie keeps interrupting Snugs on their playdate.
